security: The document contains sensitive intelligence sources and methods, including information acquired by the CIA related to foreign aspects of international terrorist activity. As noted: "SECRET--WARNING NOTICE-SENSITIVE INTELLIGENCE SOURCES AND METHODS INVOLVED--NOT RELEASABLE TO FOREIGN NATIONALS--NOT RELEASABLE TO CONTRACTORS OR CONTRACTOR/CONSULTANTS--DISSCHINATION AND EXTRACTION OF INFORMATION CONTROLLED BY ORIGINATOR.Y"
summary: This file contains documents related to Luis Clemente Posada Carriles, including State Department cables, FBI documents, and CIA intelligence reports detailing his involvement in terrorist plotting by Cuban exiles and his implication in a CIA plot to kill Castro.
summary_one_paragraph: This file, titled "POSADA, LUIS CLEMENTE," includes documents from the State Department, FBI, and CIA, covering the period around 1977. The contents range from a State Department cable regarding charges against defendants in the "Cubana Airliner" case to FBI documents concerning the Coordination of United Revolutionary Organizations (CORU) and espionage activities related to Cuba and Panama. Additionally, the file contains CIA intelligence reports about terrorist plotting by Cuban exiles, implicating Posada in activities such as attending meetings with anti-Castro groups in Santo Domingo, discussing plans to bomb Cuban aircraft, and potentially coordinating terrorist acts.
title: POSADA, LUIS CLEMENTE 201-300985 VOL. IV
recipient: FBI Intelligence Division; U.S. Army Intelligence Agency
